titleInfo.title: Progress in synthesis of tribenzotriquinacene and its derivatives

mods.abstract: Tribenzotriquinacenes are prototypical aromatic hydrocarbon with a particularly rigid, C-3v-SYMMetrical, cup-like convex/concave molecular framework consisting of three mutually fused indane units. In this article the recent progress in the synthesis of tribenzotriquinacene and its derivatives has been reviewed.
